why cant i resume steelbridge-ywm agent session?
data.approach: Add Agent Mail database lookup as fallback in getProjectPath() when temp files are not available

data.taskTitle: why cant i resume steelbridge-ywm agent session?
summary: Found bug: getProjectPath() fell back to wrong project when temp files missing
Added Agent Mail database lookup as fallback to get correct project path
Database query: SELECT p.human_key FROM agents a JOIN projects p ON a.project_id = p.id WHERE a.name = ?
Session files and JSONL verified to exist for ThickShelf agent

data.taskTitle: why cant i resume steelbridge-ywm agent session?
summary: Fixed resume API: added Agent Mail database lookup to get correct project when temp files missing
Fixed signals API: use getProjectPath(taskId) to find signals in correct project directory
Both fixes use task ID prefix to determine correct project path
